entities.name: Apple Music
entities.description: A music streaming service that allows users to listen to a vast library of songs and playlists.

entities.name: iTunes
entities.description: A media player and media library application for purchasing, organizing, and playing digital music and videos.

entities.name: Apple Podcasts
entities.description: A platform for streaming and downloading podcasts.

entities.name: Apple Arcade
entities.description: A subscription service offering access to a library of video games.

entities.name: Apple TV
entities.description: A digital media player and streaming device for accessing content on television.

entities.name: Apple Books
entities.description: An app for reading and purchasing eBooks and audiobooks.

entities.name: Privacy Policy
entities.description: The policy governing how Apple collects and uses personal information.

entities.name: Cancellation Policy
entities.description: Terms outlining the conditions under which users can cancel their orders.

entities.name: Usage Rules
entities.description: Rules that govern how users can utilize Apple’s Services and Content.

entities.name: Family Sharing
entities.description: A feature that allows family members to share subscriptions and purchases.

entities.name: Terms of Service
entities.description: The legal agreement that outlines the terms and conditions for using Apple’s Services.

entities.name: Digital Rights Management (DRM)
entities.description: Technology used to control the use of digital content and devices after sale.

entities.name: Subscription Terms
entities.description: Conditions related to the purchase and renewal of subscription services.

entities.name: Governing Law
entities.description: The laws that govern the Agreement between the user and Apple.

entities.name: Refund Policy
entities.description: Terms regarding the conditions under which refunds may be issued.

entities.name: Account Security Policy
entities.description: Guidelines for maintaining the security and confidentiality of user accounts.

entities.name: Third-Party Materials Policy
entities.description: Terms regarding the use of third-party content and services.

entities.name: In-App Purchases Policy
entities.description: Conditions governing purchases made within apps.

entities.name: Termination Policy
entities.description: Conditions under which Apple may terminate the Agreement or access to Services.
